query.name: codeBuildRule
query.label: 单据编码规则
query.sql-query: select t.* from sa_codebuildrule t where 1 = 1

query.name: commonTree
query.label: 通用树
query.sql-query: select t.id, t.kind_id, t.code, t.name, t.node_kind_id, t.parent_id,t.full_id, (select count(*) from SA_CommonTree i where i.parent_id = t.id) has_children, 'Folder' as node_Url, t.sequence from SA_CommonTree t where 1 = 1

query.name: sysDictionary
query.label: 数据字典
query.sql-query: select t.* from sa_dictionary t where 1 = 1
query.sql: select o.code, d.name, d.type_id, d.value from sa_dictionary o, sa_dictionarydetail d where o.id = d.dictionary_id and o.status = 1 and d.status = 1 order by o.code, d.sequence

query.name: sysDictionaryDetails
query.label: 数据字典明细
query.sql-query: select t.* from SA_DictionaryDetail t where t.dictionary_id = :parentId
query.sql: select d.* from SA_Dictionary m, SA_DictionaryDetail d where m.id = d.dictionary_id and m.status = 1 and d.status = 1 and m.code = :code

query.name: sysParameter
query.label: 系统参数
query.sql-query: select t.* from SA_Parameter t where 1 = 1

query.name: personQueryScheme
query.label: 个人查询方案
query.sql: select * from SA_PersonQueryScheme where person_id = :personId and kind_id = :kindId

query.name: approvalRejectedReason
query.label: 审批驳回理由
query.sql-query: select t.*,f.name as folder_name from sa_approval_rejected_reason t,sa_commontree f where t.folder_id=f.id

query.name: i18nproperties
query.label: 国际化资源维护
query.sql-query: select t.*,f.name as folder_name from sa_i18nproperties t,sa_commontree f where t.folder_id=f.id
query.sql: insert into sa_i18nproperties (id, code, value1, folder_id,resource_kind) values (:id, :code, :value1, :folderId,:resourceKind)
update sa_i18nproperties set id = :id, code = :code, value1 = :value1, folder_id = :folderId, resource_kind = :resourceKind where code = :code
select t.* from tmp_sa_i18nproperties t where t.batch_number=?
delete from tmp_sa_i18nproperties t where t.batch_number=?
update sa_i18nproperties set value1 = :value1, value2 = :value2, value3 = :value3, value4 = :value4, value5 = :value5 where code = :code

query.name: saOrgFun
query.label: 组织机构函数记录维护
query.sql-query: select t.* from sa_orgfun t where 1=1
query.sql: select t.*,(select count(*) from sa_orgfun i where i.parent_id = t.id) has_children from sa_orgfun t where t.parent_id = ? order by t.sequence asc
